Question: SECURAM Systems, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SECURAM Systems, Inc.

CES 2024

- Wi-Fi Security Smart Wall Switch Collection
- Integrated laser-based motion detection sensor
- Ambient light sensor
- Night light
- Backlit buttons
- Three configurations available: Wi-Fi Security Switch, Wi-Fi Security Dimmer Switch, and Wi-Fi Smart Switch
- Integration with SECURAM Smart Home Ecosystem
- Seamless control through SECURAM Guard mobile app for iOS and Android
- Group devices to create scenes
- Integration with SECURAM EOS smart locks
- Display and demonstrations at CES 2024 Booth #:52328
Summary_cn:
SECURAM Systems, Inc.

CES 2024

- Wi-Fi安全智能壁式开关系列
- 集成激光式运动检测传感器
- 环境光传感器
- 夜灯
- 背光按钮
- 提供三种配置：Wi-Fi安全开关、Wi-Fi安全调光开关和Wi-Fi智能开关
- 与SECURAM智能家居生态系统集成
- 通过SECURAM安全卫士iOS和安卓移动应用进行无缝控制
- 分组设备，创建场景
- 与SECURAM EOS智能门锁集成
- 在CES 2024展位＃52328展示和演示
